description:
The Escapists: Complete Edition brings you the whole original Escapists experience including all DLC packs as well as Fhurst Peak which is exclusive to Nintendo Switchâ„¢.

The Escapists is an award winning prison break simulation that provides players the opportunity of experiencing a light-hearted insight into everyday prison life. Master the routine, plan your strategy then execute your Escape.

Additional DLC Packs Included:
- Alcatraz
- Escape Team
- Duct Tapes are Forever
- Santa's Sweatshop

Also includes:
- London Tower
- Banned Camp
- Jingle Cells
- Paris Central Pen (Console Exclusive)
- Fhurst Peak (Console Exclusive)
name: The Escapists: Complete Edition
